name: Antilia - A Majestic 3D MMO
blurb: Antilia is an MMORPG featuring a beautiful world, original races, unique gameplay, and an innovative storytelling system!

rewards.reward: No Reward
SUPPORTER:  Bronze Forum Badge, and Access to our Founders Forum!
